xwikidoc.content: {{velocity}} ## The "value" filed of these options correspond to the numbering that should have the selected document if the given sibling is chosen <option data-previousSibling="" value="1"></option> #set($parentSpaceReference = $request.reference) #if("$!parentSpaceReference" != '') ## Compute the reference of the parent document #set($parentReference = "$!{parentSpaceReference}.WebHome") #set($sectionChildren = $services.query.hql("select distinct obj.name from BaseObject obj, LongProperty numbering, StringProperty parent where obj.className = 'Documentation.Code.SectionClass' and obj.name <> 'Documentation.Code.SectionTemplate' and obj.id = numbering.id.id and obj.id = parent.id.id and parent.id.name = 'parentSection' and numbering.id.name = 'numbering' and parent.value = :parentReference order by numbering.value asc").bindValue('parentReference', $parentReference).execute()) #foreach($sectionChild in $sectionChildren) #set($sectionChildRef = $services.model.resolveDocument($sectionChild)) #set($sectionChildDocument = $xwiki.getDocument($sectionChildRef)) #if($services.security.authorization.hasAccess('view', $sectionChildRef)) <option data-previousSibling="$sectionChild" value="$services.documentation.numberingManager.getNumberingFromSibling($sectionChildRef)" #if($previoussibling == $sectionChild) selected="selected"#end>$sectionChildDocument.displayTitle</option> #end #end #end {{/velocity}}
